prompt: Design a dark-themed chat list page with a deep charcoal background and a sleek black app bar displaying the title 'Messages' in white with a bold font. Include a search icon and a more options icon (three dots) on the app bar. The chat list should be scrollable, with each item featuring a 48px circular profile picture on the left with a teal accent, the contact name in white bold text, a message preview in light gray, and a timestamp in smaller light gray text aligned to the right. Use a faint gray divider between items and apply 12px padding. Ensure the design is responsive with smooth scrolling and a modern, elegant feel.
